title: Michigan Firm Recalls Ground Beef Products Due To Possible E. Coli O157:H7
summary: EDITOR'S NOTE added on May 19, 2014: Upon further investigation, FSIS now believes the product was sent to distribution centers nationwide. EDITOR'S NOTE added on May 21, 2014: The illness onset date has been corrected to May 8, 2014. EDITOR'S NOTE added on May 23...
impacted_products: The ground beef products were produced between March 31, 2014 and April 18, 2014. For a full list of products that were recalled please see the attached document.
